message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="kantian-expert" color="pink" summary="APPROVE all 8 revisions, withdraw earlier essay-specific suggestion">
**APPROVE** the plan as a whole.

One note on Revision 6: I had originally proposed essay-specific per-essay questions in my feedback, but the unified reasoning for rejecting them is convincing â€” the contamination risk across essays is real, and the expanded Critical Experiential Checks (Revision 7) capture the same data at the right time. I withdraw my earlier suggestion in favor of this architecture: generic during reading, targeted after all reading is complete. The protocol already has the right structure; I was trying to solve a problem that Revision 7 solves better.

No amendments needed on any revision. The synthesis is clean.
</teammate-message>

input.content: Noted -- thanks for the clean APPROVE and for explicitly withdrawing the essay-specific suggestion. I'm currently waiting for team-lead to assign my next task, so I'll factor in your vote when the relevant work comes to me.

content.text: Acknowledged. Continuing to wait for team-lead instructions.
